column1: Kata Robata////Who would have thought this combination could be so delectable? As soon as it hits your mouth you taste the wonderful spice of the peppercorn salmon
column3: the garlic chili oil all placed on top. Then
column5: you encounter the lovely crunch of the fried asparagus and the sweet beauty of the spicy tuna. It's executed absolutely perfectly. The rice is properly portioned
column6: the serving is ample. Well worth the price.
